import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; const Chat = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const chatData = [ { id: 1, sender: 'Robin Sparkles', message: 'Hi Tec👋', time: '52 minutes ago' }, { id: 2, sender: 'Robin Sparkles', message: 'hey🙂', time: '38 minutes ago' }, ]; const otherUsers = [ 'Gold Po', 'Princess Consuela Bananahammock', 'Barney Stinson', 'The Commodore', 'Lorenzo von Matterhorn', ]; return (
🔍

Chats

Robin Sparkles
{otherUsers.map((user, index) => (
{user}
))}

Chat App

🌙 ⚙️
{chatData.map((chat) => (

{chat.message}

{chat.time}
))}
setMessage(e.target.value)} placeholder="Write a message..." className="message-input" />
); }; export default Chat;
